gardenControl

Class Zone

  • java.lang.Object
    • gardenControl.Zone

  • public class Zone
extends java.lang.Object

    Garden can be divided into zones, each zone many have different option like Temperature control, water control ,soil control etc

    Garden can be divided into zones, each zone many have different option like Temperature control, water control ,soil control etc

    Author:
    Shivanagesh Chandra Feb 19, 2016 Zone.java
